reviewText: Fast service. Great movie for the kids.

-------------------------------------------------------
Thomas & Friends: Holiday Favorites
(Hit Entertainment, 2011)
-------------------------------------------------------
Big holiday fun for younger, preschool-age viewers who are enraptured by Thomas The Tank Engine and his pals.  This 3-DVD set includes three holiday-themed collections: "Merry Winter Wish" (2010), "Ultimate Christmas" (2007) and "Holiday Express" (2009) which were previously issued as separate discs. It's a huge load of yuletide joy, but if anyone can haul it to your door, Thomas can! (ReadThatAgain children's media reviews)
